75234.text: fix pod stuck issue due to corrupt mnt point in flexvol plugin, call Unmount if PathExists returns any error
75234.markdown: fix pod stuck issue due to corrupt mnt point in flexvol plugin, call Unmount if PathExists returns any error ([#75234](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/75234), [@andyzhangx](https://github.com/andyzhangx))
75234.author: andyzhangx

78999.text: Fix a string comparison bug in IPVS graceful termination where UDP real servers are not deleted.
78999.markdown: Fix a string comparison bug in IPVS graceful termination where UDP real servers are not deleted. ([#78999](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/78999), [@andrewsykim](https://github.com/andrewsykim))
78999.author: andrewsykim

79073.text: Remove pids cgroup controller requirement when related feature gates are disabled
79073.markdown:
Remove pids cgroup controller requirement when related feature gates are disabled
   ([#79073](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/79073), [@rafatio](https://github.com/rafatio))
79073.author: rafatio

79094.text: fix kubelet fail to delete orphaned pod directory when the kubelet's pods directory (default is "/var/lib/kubelet/pods") symbolically links to another disk device's directory
79094.markdown: fix kubelet fail to delete orphaned pod directory when the kubelet's pods directory (default is "/var/lib/kubelet/pods") symbolically links to another disk device's directory ([#79094](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/79094), [@gaorong](https://github.com/gaorong))
79094.author: gaorong

79114.text: The CRD handler now properly re-creates stale CR storage to reflect CRD update.
79114.markdown: The CRD handler now properly re-creates stale CR storage to reflect CRD update. ([#79114](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/79114), [@roycaihw](https://github.com/roycaihw))
79114.author: roycaihw

79326.text: Fix remove the etcd member from the cluster during a kubeadm reset.
79326.markdown: Fix remove the etcd member from the cluster during a kubeadm reset. ([#79326](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/79326), [@bradbeam](https://github.com/bradbeam))
79326.author: bradbeam

79451.text: Fix a bug where kubelet would not retry pod sandbox creation when the restart policy of the pod is Never
79451.markdown: Fix a bug where kubelet would not retry pod sandbox creation when the restart policy of the pod is Never ([#79451](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/79451), [@yujuhong](https://github.com/yujuhong))
79451.author: yujuhong

79498.text: kubeadm: fix the bug that "--cri-socket" flag does not work for `kubeadm reset`
79498.markdown: kubeadm: fix the bug that "--cri-socket" flag does not work for `kubeadm reset` ([#79498](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/79498), [@SataQiu](https://github.com/SataQiu))
79498.author: SataQiu

79514.text: Default resourceGroup should be used when the value of annotation azure-load-balancer-resource-group is an empty string.
79514.markdown: Default resourceGroup should be used when the value of annotation azure-load-balancer-resource-group is an empty string. ([#79514](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/79514), [@feiskyer](https://github.com/feiskyer))
79514.author: feiskyer

79529.text: changes timeout value in csi plugin from 15s to 2min which fixes the timeout issue
79529.markdown: changes timeout value in csi plugin from 15s to 2min which fixes the timeout issue ([#79529](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/79529), [@andyzhangx](https://github.com/andyzhangx))
79529.author: andyzhangx

79534.text: Fix possible fd leak and closing of dirs in doSafeMakeDir
79534.markdown: Fix possible fd leak and closing of dirs in doSafeMakeDir  ([#79534](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/79534), [@odinuge](https://github.com/odinuge))
79534.author: odinuge

79636.text: Fixes a bug in openapi published for custom resources using x-kubernetes-preserve-unknown-fields extensions, so that kubectl will allow sending unknown fields for that portion of the object.
79636.markdown: Fixes a bug in openapi published for custom resources using x-kubernetes-preserve-unknown-fields extensions, so that kubectl will allow sending unknown fields for that portion of the object. ([#79636](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/79636), [@liggitt](https://github.com/liggitt))
79636.author: liggitt

79677.text: kubeadm: implement support for concurrent add/remove of stacked etcd members
79677.markdown: kubeadm: implement support for concurrent add/remove of stacked etcd members ([#79677](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/79677), [@neolit123](https://github.com/neolit123))
79677.author: neolit123

79895.markdown: Resolves an issue serving aggregated APIs backed by services that respond to requests to `/` with non-2xx HTTP responses ([#79895](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/79895), [@deads2k](https://github.com/deads2k))
